name: Lazy Shift
description:
Made in Unity during 72 hours for Mağara Jam 3, 2021. Theme: System Malfunction

You are just an ordinary night shift guard. Every night on your shift goes without action just eating donuts and playing solitaire but tonight is different you can feel it.

tonight there's a system failure and you need to fix it before morning or else your boss will fire you immediately!

BEWARE! The gameplay video has spoilers if you want to play the game and solve the puzzles on your own please only watch the beginning and don't go further.

[Team & Credits]
